OUTLINE : Cytoreductive therapy : Patients receive 3 course salvage chemotherapy ( e.g. , dexamethasone , high dose cytarabine , cisplatin ( DHAP ) ; etoposide , methylprednisolone , high dose cytarabine , cisplatin ( ESHAP ) ; fludarabine , mitoxantrone , dexamethasone ( FND ) ) . Harvest : Patients HLA identical sibling donor assign allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) transplantation group .
